game.name: Secrets of Moon Island
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An indie (solo dev) Action Adventure RPG with Swordplay. Fight monsters in the game's own, non target based combat system. Become stronger by leveling up and collecting / looting items and equipment. Explore and discover the islands mysteries and secrets. What will you find?
game.shortDescriptionEn: An indie (solo dev) Action Adventure RPG with Swordplay. Fight monsters in the game's own, non target based combat system. Become stronger by leveling up and collecting / looting items and equipment. Explore and discover the islands mysteries and secrets. What will you find?
